alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:44PM CDT until August 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CIMARRON COUNTY... At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Keyes, or 9 miles northeast of Boise City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Cimarron County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
